00040 #ifndef _timermanager_cpp
00041 #define _timermanager_cpp
00042 
00043 #include "timermanager.h"
00044 #include "extendedtimer.h"
00045 #include "simpletimer.h"
00046 #include <Ogre.h>
00047 
00048 namespace phys
00049 {
00050     TimerManager::TimerManager()
00051     {
00052         this->Priority = 5;
00053         MasterTimer = new Ogre::Timer();
00054     }
00055 
00056     TimerManager::~TimerManager()
00057     {
00058         for( Whole x = 0 ; x < Timers.size() ; x++ )
00059         {
00060             delete Timers[x];
00061         }
00062         Timers.clear();
00063         delete MasterTimer;
00064     }
00065 
00066     SimpleTimer* TimerManager::CreateSimpleTimer(const Timer::TimerStyle Style)
00067     {
00068         SimpleTimer* SimTimer = new SimpleTimer(Style);
00069         Timers.push_back(SimTimer);
00070         return SimTimer;
00071     }
00072 
00073     ExtendedTimer* TimerManager::CreateExtendedTimer(const Timer::TimerStyle Style)
00074     {
00075         ExtendedTimer* ExTimer = new ExtendedTimer(Style);
00076         Timers.push_back(ExTimer);
00077         return ExTimer;
00078     }
00079 
00080     Timer* TimerManager::GetTimer(const Whole Index)
00081     {
00082         return Timers[Index];
00083     }
00084 
00085     Whole TimerManager::GetNumTimers()
00086     {
00087         return Timers.size();
00088     }
00089 
00090     void TimerManager::DestroyTimer(Timer* ToBeDestroyed)
00091     {
00092         if(!ToBeDestroyed)
00093             return;
00094         if(Timers.empty())
00095             return;
00096         for( std::vector<Timer*>::iterator it = Timers.begin() ; it != Timers.end() ; it++ )
00097         {
00098             if( ToBeDestroyed == (*it) )
00099             {
00100                 delete ToBeDestroyed;
00101                 Timers.erase(it);
00102                 return;
00103             }
00104         }
00105     }
00106 
00107     void TimerManager::Initialize()
00108     {
00109     }
00110 
00111     void TimerManager::DoMainLoopItems()
00112     {
00113         if(Timers.empty())
00114             return;
00115         Whole Elapsed = MasterTimer->getMicroseconds();
00116         MasterTimer->reset();
00117         for( std::vector<Timer*>::iterator it = Timers.begin() ; it != Timers.end() ; it++ )
00118         {
00119             (*it)->Update(Elapsed);
00120         }
00121     }
00122 
00123     ManagerBase::ManagerTypeName TimerManager::GetType() const
00124     { return ManagerBase::TimerManager; }
00125 }
00126 
00127 #endif
